description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. [engo] is an overhead twinstick shooter Grab the maximum of stars in 5 minutes 6 arenas, each arena has its own configuration which influences greatly the gameplay 6 weapons which you can collect on the map, each weapon has its own capacity Bonus are also present on the map such as missiles, mines,... Be careful, all of them are not good to take

Be careful, all of them are not good to take
